FuncDef:
The port command configures the interface number range for data backup.
The undo port command deletes the interface number range for data backup.
By default, no interface number range for data backup is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a start interface number.
The value is an integer ranging from 1025 to 65280.

Specifies an end interface number. high-port-number must be greater than low-port-number, and the value difference must be 255.
The value is an integer ranging from 1280 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In dual-system hot backup scenarios, to configure the interface number range for data backup, run the port command.
Precautions
After an IPsec instance is applied to an IPsec policy, the interface number range for data backup cannot be modified.
